discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AE
"Expansion" is the hint in both responses.

I think it's A.E.. 
C might be an option but making customer purchase a new solution is more related with sales team's activities, not within customer success.

Selected Answer: AC
A and C

There are many ways that you can add value for your customers by expanding their consumption of your solutions and services, such as these examples:
- Add features to the product or upgrade the license tier
- Implement or optimize services

comments.content: Agreed. "Add features to the product or upgrade the license tier" and "New solutions - Adjacent technologies" should be considered.

discussion.content: A and C?

questions.question_text: Which two outcomes are expansion opportunities within customer success? (Choose two.)

choices.C: The adoption campaign notifies customers of a critical bug.
choices.D: The adoption campaign provides free trial licenses for feature upgrades.
choices.B: The adoption campaign surveys all end users for product feedback.
choices.A: The adoption campaign provides notifications of new feature releases.
choices.E: The adoption campaign provides free user training.

discussion.content: The answer correct B&E

Selected Answer: BE
I think B & E. Information on new features is never part of CX

comments.content: Also aligns with the answers in question 88

questions.question_text: In which two ways can an adoption campaign identify expansion opportunities? (Choose two.)

choices.B: adding headcount to manage solution by the customer

discussion.content: A & E should be correct. Training on existing features shouldn't a expansion.

Selected Answer: AE
A) Providing solution optimization services: By providing solution optimization services, Customer Success teams can help customers get the most value out of their solution. This can lead to increased adoption and potentially even an upgrade to a higher subscription level.

E) Increasing license count: As a customer's business grows, they may need to increase their license count to support additional users.

Selected Answer: AE
AE, optimization services, license count.

questions.question_text: What are two examples of expand opportunities? (Choose two.)
What is a type of expansion opportunity?

discussion.content: A. additional user groups

Selected Answer: A
As a customer's business grows, they may need to add additional user groups to support new business initiatives or to expand into new regions or business units

correct answer is A

BC. B Evaluation: sales team. C awareness: marketing.

Selected Answer: BC
B & C
Awareness (Industry term) = Need (CISCO term)
Adoption is not Sales/Marketing

comments.content:
But marketing team would be the one responsible for announcing new features and bundles of current products, helping the customer utilize those new features or subscribe to them, which will lead him to interacting with sales team.
That's just my opinion!
